changes_summary: These commits primarily focus on OTP (One-Time Purchase) cart and checkout functionality, reactivation flow improvements, and Box Model Builder enhancements. Multiple test improvements include unquarantining tests and adding test IDs. Several bug fixes address pricing display, meal selection, and payment validation issues.

features.name: OTP Cart Checkout Handling
features.description: Handles One-Time Purchase cart submission during checkout process

features.name: OTP Address Persistence
features.description: POST-only endpoint for persisting OTP addresses and PUT endpoint for customer address updates

features.name: Box Model Builder Calorie Range Overrides
features.description: Adds calorie range override functionality and general overrides to Box Model Builder

features.name: Entry Point Reactivation Pricing
features.description: Adds price display to entry point reactivation flow

features.name: Legacy to Shopify Factorform Redirect Monitoring
features.description: Adds tracing for monitoring redirects from legacy factorform to Shopify factorform

features.name: Breed Message Feature
features.description: Feature flag cleanup for breed message functionality

decisions.what: Separate /batch fetch logic across plan-selection flows
decisions.rationale: Improves organization and maintainability of plan selection data fetching
Improves user experience by showing meals without delay

decisions.what: Add Contentful key for invalid payment message
decisions.rationale: Enables content management for payment error messaging

refactors.reason: Separate concerns across different plan-selection flows
refactors.impact: Plan selection flows and data fetching architecture
Test suite for order breakdown component

refactors.reason: Clean up feature flag after rollout completion

fixes.issue: Meal selection revert on addons save

entities.name: OTP Cart
entities.context: Enhanced with checkout submission handling and address persistence

entities.name: Box Model Builder
entities.context: Extended with calorie range overrides and general override functionality

entities.name: Reactivation Flow
entities.context: Multiple improvements including pricing display, meal display timing, and voucher validation

entities.name: Shopify Factorform
entities.context: Added monitoring for redirects from legacy factorform

entities.name: Contentful
entities.context: Added key for invalid payment message management

key_patterns: Test quality improvements: multiple commits unquarantine tests and add test IDs for better test reliability
API endpoint expansion: adding both POST and PUT endpoints for OTP address management following REST conventions
Feature flag lifecycle management: cleanup of breed message feature flag after successful rollout
Monitoring and observability: adding traces for system migration tracking (legacy to Shopify)
User experience focus: immediate meal display, pricing transparency, and keyboard accessibility improvements
Modular architecture: separating batch fetch logic across different flows for better maintainability
